Universal Comments

Instead of storing custom usernames with each comment we should display Identity ID's by default. If the user wants to load the identity of a commenter they can lookup the Dash username associated with the identity. dApp's using this comment system can also choose to lookup Dash Platform Usernames for each identity on comment load. Comment system is integrated into `dapp-sdk` and can be used on for any dApp or web2.0 website If additional tasks are created I will launch a decentralized Disqus competitor built on platform.
